original_text: And he took about five thousand men, and set them to lie in ambush between Bethel and Ai, on the west side of the city.
korean_text: 그가 약 오천 명을 택하여 성읍 서쪽 벧엘과 아이 사이에 매복시키니

sentences.original_text: And he took about five thousand men
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 약 오천 명의 군사를 데리고

sentences.original_text: and set them to lie in ambush
on the west side of the city
